1) Please choose your first tradesmen,then select 'book now' 

 2) Go back to the 'Job information' screen & select the same requirements.

 i.e The same trade,problem and date and change the time to 30min-1 hr difference than previous set time.(this is the trademen don't arrive at the same time)then select 'accept'

 3) On the 'select tradesmen' screen please select a diffrent tradesman then select 'book now'

 4) Repeat this process if you require 1 more quote.
